caption.center: PETER McLAUGHLIN, RESPONDENT, v. HAHNE COMPANY, APPELLANT.

opinion.posture: On appeal from the Supreme Court, whose per curiam opinion is printed in 12 N.J. Mis. R. 6.
opinion.attorneys:
For the appellant, Cohen Kline.
For the respondent, Herman M. Wilson.Page 33
opinion.opinion_text:
The judgment under review herein should be affirmed, for the reasons expressed in the opinion delivered in the Supreme Court.
For affirmance — THE CHANCELLOR, CHIEF JUSTICE, TRENCHARD, PARKER, LLOYD, HEHER, PERSKIE, VAN BUSKIRK, KAYS, HETFIELD, DEAR, WELLS, DILL, JJ. 13.
For reversal — None.
